verses.verse: Now Korah<WH7141>, the son<WH1121> of Izhar<WH3324>, the son<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955>, the son<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878>, and Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram<WH48>, the sons<WH1121> of Eliab<WH446>, and On<WH203>, the son<WH1121> of Peleth<WH6431>, sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205>, took men<WH3947>:

And they rose up<WH6965> before<WH6440> Moses<WH4872>, with certain<WH582> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> princes<WH5387> of the assembly<WH5712>, famous<WH7148> in the congregation<WH4150>, men<WH582> of renown<WH8034>:

And they gathered themselves together<WH6950> against Moses<WH4872> and against Aaron<WH175>, and said<WH559> unto them<WH7227>, You take too much upon you<WH5712>, seeing all the congregation are holy<WH6918>, every one of them<WH3068>, and the Lord is among<WH8432> them<WH5375>: why then lift you up yourselves above the congregation<WH6951> of the Lord<WH3068>?
And when Moses<WH4872> heard<WH8085> it<WH5307>, he fell upon his face<WH6440>:

And he spoke<WH1696> unto Korah<WH7141> and unto all his company<WH5712>, saying<WH559>, Even to morrow<WH1242> the Lord<WH3068> will show<WH3045> who are his<WH6918>, and who is holy; and will cause him to come near<WH7126> unto him<WH977>: even him whom he has chosen will he cause to come near unto him<WH7126>.
This do<WH6213>; Take<WH3947> you censers<WH4289>, Korah<WH7141>, and all his company<WH5712>;

And put<WH5414> fire<WH784> in it<WH2004>, and put<WH7760> incense<WH7004> in them before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> to morrow<WH4279>: and it shall be that the man<WH376> whom the Lord<WH3068> does choose<WH977>, he shall be holy<WH6918>: you take too much<WH7227> upon you<WH1121>, you sons of Levi<WH3878>.
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto Korah<WH7141>, Hear<WH8085>, I pray you<WH1121>, you sons of Levi<WH3878>:

Seems it but a small thing<WH4592> unto you<WH430>, that the God of Israel<WH3478> has separated<WH914> you from the congregation<WH5712> of Israel<WH3478>, to bring you near<WH7126> to himself to do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the Lord<WH3068>, and to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> the congregation<WH5712> to minister unto them<WH8334>?
And he has brought you near<WH7126> to him<WH251>, and all your brothers the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> with you<WH1245>: and seek you the priesthood also<WH3550>?
For which cause<WH3651> both you and all your company<WH5712> are gathered together<WH3259> against the Lord<WH3068>: and what is Aaron<WH175>, that you murmur against him<WH3885>?
And Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> to call<WH7121> Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram<WH48>, the sons<WH1121> of Eliab<WH446>: which said<WH559>, We will not come up<WH5927>:

Is it a small thing<WH4592> that<WH3588> you have brought us up<WH5927> out of a land<WH776> that flows<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>, to kill<WH4191> us in the wilderness<WH4057>, except you make<WH8323> yourself altogether<WH8323> a prince over us<WH8323>?

Moreover<WH637> you have not brought<WH935> us into a land<WH776> that flows<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>, or given<WH5414> us inheritance<WH5159> of fields<WH7704> and vineyards<WH3754>: will you put out<WH5365> the eyes<WH5869> of these men<WH582>? we will not come up<WH5927>.

And Moses<WH4872> was very<WH3966> angry<WH2734>, and said<WH559> unto the Lord<WH3068>, Respect<WH6437> not you their offering<WH4503>: I have not taken<WH5375> one<WH259> donkey<WH2543> from them<WH7489>, neither have I hurt one of them<WH259>.
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto Korah<WH7141>, Be you and all your company<WH5712> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>, you<WH175>, and they, and Aaron, to morrow<WH4279>:

And take<WH3947> every man<WH376> his censer<WH4289>, and put<WH5414> incense<WH7004> in them<WH7126>, and bring you before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> every man<WH376> his censer<WH4289>, two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> censers<WH4289>; you also<WH175>, and Aaron, each<WH376> of you his censer<WH4289>.

And they took<WH3947> every man<WH376> his censer<WH4289>, and put<WH5414> fire<WH784> in them<WH7760>, and laid incense<WH7004> on it<WH5975>, and stood in the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> with Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175>.

And Korah<WH7141> gathered<WH6950> all the congregation<WH5712> against them unto the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>: and the glory<WH3519> of the Lord<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> unto all the congregation<WH5712>.
And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> and unto Aaron<WH175>, saying<WH559>,
Separate<WH914> yourselves from among<WH8432> this congregation<WH5712>, that I may consume<WH3615> them in a moment<WH7281>.

And they fell<WH5307> upon their faces<WH6440>, and said<WH559>, O God<WH410>, the God<WH430> of the spirits<WH7307> of all flesh<WH1320>, shall one<WH259> man<WH376> sin<WH2398>, and will you be angry<WH7107> with all the congregation<WH5712>?
And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Speak<WH1696> unto the congregation<WH5712>, saying<WH559>, Get you away<WH5927> from around<WH5439> the tabernacle<WH4908> of Korah<WH7141>, Dathan<WH1885>, and Abiram<WH48>.
And Moses<WH4872> rose up<WH6965> and went<WH3212> unto Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram<WH48>; and the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> followed<WH3212> him<WH310>.

And he spoke<WH1696> unto the congregation<WH5712>, saying<WH559>, Depart<WH5493>, I pray you<WH168>, from the tents of these wicked<WH7563> men<WH582>, and touch<WH5060> nothing of theirs<WH5595>, lest you be consumed in all their sins<WH2403>.

So they went away<WH5927> from the tabernacle<WH4908> of Korah<WH7141>, Dathan<WH1885>, and Abiram<WH48>, on every side<WH5439>: and Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram<WH48> came out<WH3318>, and stood<WH5324> in the door<WH6607> of their tents<WH168>, and their wives<WH802>, and their sons<WH1121>, and their little sons<WH2945>.
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559>, Hereby you shall know<WH3045> that the Lord<WH3068> has sent<WH7971> me to do<WH6213> all these works<WH4639>; for I have not done them of my own mind<WH3820>.
If these men die<WH4191> the common death<WH4194> of all men<WH120>, or if they be visited<WH6485> after the visitation<WH6486> of all men<WH120>; then the Lord<WH3068> has not sent me<WH7971>.

But if the Lord<WH3068> make<WH1254> a new thing<WH1278>, and the earth<WH127> open<WH6475> her mouth<WH6310>, and swallow them up<WH1104>, with all that appertain unto them<WH3381>, and they go down quick<WH2416> into the pit<WH7585>; then you shall understand<WH3045> that these men<WH582> have provoked<WH5006> the Lord<WH3068>.
And it came to pass<WH3615>, as he had made an end of speaking<WH1696> all these words<WH1697>, that the ground<WH127> split asunder that was under them<WH1234>:

And the earth<WH776> opened<WH6605> her mouth<WH6310>, and swallowed them up<WH1104>, and their houses<WH1004>, and all the men<WH120> that appertained unto Korah<WH7141>, and all their goods<WH7399>.

They<WH3381>, and all that appertained to them, went down alive<WH2416> into the pit<WH7585>, and the earth<WH776> closed<WH3680> upon them<WH6>: and they perished from among<WH8432> the congregation<WH6951>.
And all Israel<WH3478> that were round about<WH5439> them fled<WH5127> at the cry<WH6963> of them<WH559>: for they said, Lest the earth<WH776> swallow us up also<WH1104>.
And there came out<WH3318> a fire<WH784> from the Lord<WH3068>, and consumed<WH398> the two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> men<WH376> that offered<WH7126> incense<WH7004>.
And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak<WH559> unto Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>, that he take up<WH7311> the censers<WH4289> out<WH996> of the burning<WH8316>, and scatter<WH2219> you the fire<WH784> yonder<WH1973>; for they are hallowed<WH6942>.

The censers<WH4289> of these sinners<WH2400> against their own souls<WH5315>, let them make<WH6213> them broad<WH7555> plates<WH6341> for a covering<WH6826> of the altar<WH4196>: for they offered<WH7126> them before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>, therefore they are hallowed<WH6942>: and they shall be a sign<WH226> unto the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> the bronze<WH5178> censers<WH4289>, with which they that were burnt<WH8313> had offered<WH7126>; and they were made broad<WH7554> plates for a covering<WH6826> of the altar<WH4196>:

To be a memorial<WH2146> unto the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, that<WH834> no stranger<WH376>, which is not of the seed<WH2233> of Aaron<WH175>, come near<WH7126> to offer<WH6999> incense<WH7004> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>; that he be not as Korah<WH7141>, and as his company<WH5712>: as the Lord<WH3068> said<WH1696> to him by the hand<WH3027> of Moses<WH4872>.

But on the next day<WH4283> all the congregation<WH5712> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> murmured<WH3885> against Moses<WH4872> and against Aaron<WH175>, saying<WH559>, You have killed<WH4191> the people<WH5971> of the Lord<WH3068>.

And it came to pass<WH5712>, when the congregation was gathered<WH6950> against Moses<WH4872> and against Aaron<WH175>, that they looked<WH6437> toward the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>: and<WH6051>, behold, the cloud covered<WH3680> it<WH3519>, and the glory of the Lord<WH3068> appeared<WH7200>.
And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> came<WH935> before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>.
And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Get you away<WH7426> from among<WH8432> this congregation<WH5712>, that I may consume<WH3615> them as in a moment<WH7281>. And they fell<WH5307> upon their faces<WH6440>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Take<WH3947> a censer<WH4289>, and put<WH5414> fire<WH784> in it from off<WH6440> the altar<WH4196>, and put<WH7760> on incense<WH7004>, and go<WH3212> quickly<WH4120> unto the congregation<WH5712>, and make an atonement<WH3722> for them<WH7110>: for there is wrath gone out<WH3318> from the Lord<WH3068>; the plague<WH5063> is begun<WH2490>.

And Aaron<WH175> took<WH3947> as Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH1696>, and ran<WH7323> into the middle<WH8432> of the congregation<WH6951>; and<WH5063>, behold, the plague was begun<WH2490> among the people<WH5971>: and he put<WH5414> on incense<WH7004>, and made an atonement<WH3722> for the people<WH5971>.
And he stood<WH5975> between the dead<WH4191> and the living<WH2416>; and the plague<WH4046> was stayed<WH6113>.
Now they that died<WH4191> in the plague<WH4046> were fourteen<WH702> thousand<WH505> and seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967>, beside them that died<WH4191> about the matter<WH1697> of Korah<WH7141>.
And Aaron<WH175> returned<WH7725> unto Moses<WH4872> unto the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>: and the plague<WH4046> was stayed<WH6113>.
